text: Dressed to Kill is the third studio album from the American hard rock/heavy metal band Kiss. It was released on March 19, 1975. == Track listing == *Room Service *Two Timer *Ladies in Waiting *Getaway *Rock Bottom *C'mon and Love Me *Anything for My Baby *She *Love Her All I Can *Rock and Roll All Nite Category:Kiss (band) albums Category:1975 albums Category:Hard rock albums Category:Heavy metal albums
title: Dressed to Kill
